row.scheme:
;;;RehearsalMarkNonPrinting ;;;Non Printing Bookmark ;;;by Nils Gey RTS Modified to avoid poluting the global namespace with the variable user-input
(let ((user-input "XXX")) (set! user-input (d-GetUserInput "Named Bookmark" "Give a name" "X"))
(if user-input ;in case the user pressed Escape do nothing (begin (d-Directive-standalone "RehearsalMark") (d-DirectivePut-standalone-display "RehearsalMark" user-input) (d-DirectivePut-standalone-ty "RehearsalMark" -40) (d-DirectivePut-standalone-tx "RehearsalMark" -10) )) (d-RefreshDisplay))
row._tooltip: Adds a custom Denemo bookmark without Lilypond output.
